Directives: field-label

field-label

field-label(inputUid, help, label, required, uid)

This component is only intended for internal use by the formFor module.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
inputUid String

ID of the associated input field element; used as the :for attribute of the inner

help String

Optional help tooltip to display on hover. By default this makes use of the Angular Bootstrap tooltip directive and the Font Awesome icon set.
label String

Field label string. This string can contain HTML markup.
required String

Optional attribute specifies that this field is a required field. If a required label has been provided via FormForConfiguration then field label will display that value for required fields.
uid String

Optional UID for HTML element containing the label string
Source:
  • directives/field-label.js, line 1
Example
// To display a simple label with a help tooltip:
<field-label label="Username"
             help="This will be visible to other users">
</field-label>
